name: Treasure Moon
description:
Drive around the advanced moon civilisation, avoiding gun turrets in order to collect the moon's precious treasure - money, alcohol and motherboards!

Collect treasure, then bring it back to your home base. You've only got three minutes to collect as much as possible, but can only carry one object at a time, so make your trips count!

Use the arrow keys or WASD to drive.

This is my entry in the A Game By Its Cover 2018 game jam.
